name: Carrie Olivia Adams
bio: Carrie Olivia Adams lives in Chicago, where she works in publishing and serves as the poetry editor for Black Ocean. She is the author of Operating Theater (Noctuary Press, 2015), Forty-One Jane Doe’s (Ahsahta, 2013), and Intervening Absence (Ahsahta, 2009), as well as the chapbooks Grapple (above/ground press, 2017), Overture in the Key of F (above/ground press, 2013), and A Useless Window (Black Ocean, 2006).
